00033 ls_minimizer2::ls_minimizer2(int state_size)
00034 {
00035   state=0;
00036   new_state=0;
00037   best_state=0;
00038   scales=0;
00039   step_solver=0;
00040   ground_truth_state=0;
00041   J=0;
00042   use_user_scaling = false;
00043   use_automated_scaling = true;
00044   new_iteration_callback = 0;
00045   state_change_callback = 0;
00046   set_default_values();
00047   set_state_size(state_size);
00048 }
00049 
00050 void ls_minimizer2::set_state_size(int state_size)
00051 {
00052   free_all();
00053   if (state_size<=0) return;
00054 
00055   this->state_size = state_size;
00056   state = new flt_t[state_size];
00057   new_state = new flt_t[state_size];
00058   best_state = new flt_t[state_size];
00059   scales = new flt_t[state_size];
00060   for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++)
00061     scales[i] = 1.;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void ls_minimizer2::alloc_matrices(int maximum_scalar_measure_number)
00065 {
00066   assert(state_size>0);
00067   assert(maximum_scalar_measure_number>0);
00068 
00069   if (J && real_J_size>=maximum_scalar_measure_number) {
00070           step_solver->resize(state_size, maximum_scalar_measure_number);
00071           return;
00072   }
00073 
00074   free_matrices();
00075   step_solver = new ls_step_solver(state_size, maximum_scalar_measure_number);
00076   real_J_size = maximum_scalar_measure_number;
00077   J = cvCreateMat(maximum_scalar_measure_number, state_size, CV_64F);
00078   newJ = cvCreateMat(maximum_scalar_measure_number, state_size, CV_64F);
00079   eps = cvCreateMat(maximum_scalar_measure_number, 1, CV_64F);
00080   eps_previous = cvCreateMat(maximum_scalar_measure_number, 1, CV_64F);
00081   //Jt = cvCreateMat(state_size, maximum_scalar_measure_number, CV_64F);
00082   JtJ = cvCreateMat(state_size, state_size, CV_64F);
00083   Jteps = cvCreateMat(state_size, 1, CV_64F);
00084   ds = cvCreateMat(state_size, 1, CV_64F);
00085   Jds = cvCreateMat(maximum_scalar_measure_number, 1, CV_64F);
00086 
00087   // For Levenberg-Marquardt:
00088   aug_JtJ = cvCreateMat(state_size, state_size, CV_64F);
00089 
00090   // For Dog Leg:
00091   dl_delta_sd   = cvCreateMat(state_size, 1, CV_64F);
00092   dl_delta_gn   = cvCreateMat(state_size, 1, CV_64F);
00093   dl_delta_dl   = cvCreateMat(state_size, 1, CV_64F);
00094   dl_delta_diff = cvCreateMat(state_size, 1, CV_64F);
00095   JtJdelta      = cvCreateMat(state_size, 1, CV_64F);
00096   JJteps = cvCreateMat(maximum_scalar_measure_number, 1, CV_64F);
00097 
00098   // For Cat Tail:
00099   ct_delta_gn   = cvCreateMat(state_size, 1, CV_64F);
00100   ct_delta_sd   = cvCreateMat(state_size, 1, CV_64F);
00101 
00102 }
00103 
00104 ls_minimizer2::~ls_minimizer2() {
00105   free_all();
00106 }

00108 void ls_minimizer2::free_all()
00109 {
00110   if (state) {
00111     delete[] state;
00112     delete[] new_state;
00113     delete[] best_state;
00114     delete[] scales;
00115     delete[] ground_truth_state;
00116   }
00117   free_matrices();
00118 }
00119 
00120 void ls_minimizer2::free_matrices()
00121 {
00122   if (step_solver) delete step_solver;
00123   step_solver=0;
00124 
00125   if (J==0) return;
00126 
00127   cvReleaseMat(&J);
00128   cvReleaseMat(&newJ);
00129   cvReleaseMat(&eps);
00130   cvReleaseMat(&eps_previous);
00131   //cvReleaseMat(&Jt);
00132   cvReleaseMat(&JtJ);
00133   cvReleaseMat(&Jteps);
00134   cvReleaseMat(&ds);
00135   cvReleaseMat(&Jds);
00136 
00137   cvReleaseMat(&aug_JtJ);
00138   cvReleaseMat(&dl_delta_sd);
00139   cvReleaseMat(&dl_delta_gn);
00140   cvReleaseMat(&dl_delta_dl);
00141   cvReleaseMat(&dl_delta_diff);
00142   cvReleaseMat(&JtJdelta);
00143   cvReleaseMat(&JJteps);
00144 
00145   cvReleaseMat(&ct_delta_gn);
00146   cvReleaseMat(&ct_delta_sd);
00147 }

00149 void ls_minimizer2::set_user_data(int slot_index, void * ptr)

00155 
00156 void ls_minimizer2::set_scales(flt_t * scales)
00157 {
00158   flt_t norm = 0;
00159   for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++)
00160     norm += scales[i] * scales[i];
00161   norm = sqrt(norm);
00162 
00163   for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++)
00164     this->scales[i] = scales[i] / (state_size * norm);
00165 
00166   use_user_scaling = true;
00167 }

00169 void ls_minimizer2::set_default_values(void)
00170 {
00171   set_verbose_level(0);
00172 
00173   default_squared_c = numeric_limits<flt_t>::max();
00174 
00175   lm_set_initial_lambda(0);
00176   lm_set_max_iterations(50);
00177   lm_set_max_failures_in_a_row(10);
00178   lm_set_tol_cos(1e-5);
00179 
00180   ct_set_max_iterations(50);
00181   set_line_search_parameters(1e-3, 5, 1.2);
00182 
00183   inside_julien_method = false;
00184 }

00238 void ls_minimizer2::reset_observations(void) {
00239   erase_observations(0);
00240 }
00241 
00242 void ls_minimizer2::erase_observations(int a, int b)
00243 {
00244   assert(b<0 || (a<=b));
00245   if (a >= (signed)observations.size()) return;
00246   observation_vector::iterator first = observations.begin()+a;
00247   observation_vector::iterator last = (b<0 ? observations.end() : observations.begin()+b);
00248   for (observation_vector::iterator it = first; it != last; ++it)
00249   {
00250     if ((*it)->delete_me) delete *it;
00251     else if ((*it)->array_delete_me) delete[] *it;
00252   }
00253   observations.erase(first,last);
00254   assert(a == (signed)observations.size());
00255 }

00257 void ls_minimizer2::set_default_c(flt_t c)
00258 {
00259   default_squared_c = c * c;
00260 }
00261 
00262 void ls_minimizer2::add_observation(observation *obs, bool to_delete, bool to_array_delete)
00263 {
00264   assert(!(to_delete && to_array_delete));
00265 
00266   //if (obs->weight <=0) return;
00267 
00268   obs->sqrt_weight = obs->weight*obs->weight;
00269   obs->delete_me = to_delete;
00270   obs->array_delete_me = to_array_delete;
00271   observations.push_back(obs);
00272 }

00274 void ls_minimizer2::set_last_observation_c(flt_t c)
00275 {
00276   observation *o = observations.back();
00277   assert(o!=0);
00278 
00279   o->squared_c = c*c;
00280 }

00311 
00312 ls_minimizer2::flt_t ls_minimizer2::observation::residual(const flt_t *computed_b) const
00313 {
00314   int n = get_nb_measures();
00315   flt_t r=0;
00316   for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {
00317     flt_t d = computed_b[i] - b[i];
00318     r += d*d;
00319   }
00320   return r;
00321 }
00322 
00323 ls_minimizer2::flt_t ls_minimizer2::residual(flt_t * state)
00324 {
00325   flt_t result = 0.;
00326 
00327   flt_t b[MAX_B_SIZE];
00328 
00329   for (observation_vector::iterator it = observations.begin();
00330     it != observations.end(); ++it)
00331   {
00332     observation *obs = *it;
00333     obs->eval_func(state, b, 0, user_data);
00334     result += obs->weight*rho(obs->residual(b), obs->squared_c);
00335   }
00336   return result;
00337 }
00338 
00339 void ls_minimizer2::compare_state_with_ground_truth(void)
00340 {
00341   if (ground_truth_state==0) return;
00342   cout << endl;
00343   cout << "FOUND: ";
00344   compute_residual(state, true);
00345   cout << "GROUND TRUTH: ";
00346   compute_residual(ground_truth_state, true);
00347 
00348   if (new_iteration_callback != 0) new_iteration_callback(state, user_data);
00349 }
00350 
00351 void ls_minimizer2::compare_outliers_with_ground_truth(void)
00352 {
00353   int correct_inlier_number = 0, correct_outlier_number = 0;
00354 
00355   flt_t b[MAX_B_SIZE];
00356 
00357   int gt_inliers = 0;
00358 
00359   int observation_number = 0;
00360   for (observation_vector::iterator it = observations.begin();
00361     it != observations.end(); ++it)
00362   {
00363     observation *o = *it;
00364     o->eval_func(state, b, 0, user_data);
00365     flt_t diff = o->residual(b);
00366 
00367     if (diff < o->squared_c && !o->ground_truth_outlier)
00368       correct_inlier_number++;
00369     else if (diff >= o->squared_c && o->ground_truth_outlier)
00370       correct_outlier_number++;
00371 
00372     if (!o->ground_truth_outlier) gt_inliers++;
00373     ++observation_number;
00374   }
00375 
00376 
00377   cout << endl;
00378   cout << (100.0 * correct_inlier_number)  / gt_inliers << "% inliers and ";
00379   cout << (100.0 * correct_outlier_number) / (observation_number - gt_inliers) << "% outliers correctly found.";
00380   cout << endl;
00381 }
00382 
00383 ls_minimizer2::flt_t ls_minimizer2::build_eps(flt_t * state, flt_t current_best_residual, bool outliers_in_residual)
00384 {
00385   int im_n = 0;
00386   flt_t residual = 0;
00387 
00388   if (new_iteration_callback != 0) new_iteration_callback(state, user_data);
00389 
00390   flt_t b[MAX_B_SIZE];
00391   /*flt_t diff[MAX_B_SIZE];*/
00392   nb_inliers = 0;
00393   for (observation_vector::iterator it = observations.begin();
00394     it != observations.end(); ++it)
00395   {
00396     observation *o = *it;
00397     o->eval_func(state, b, newJ->data.db + im_n*state_size, user_data);
00398 
00399     flt_t res = o->residual(b);
00400     assert(res >= 0);
00401     assert(o->squared_c>=0);
00402     int n = o->get_nb_measures();
00403     if (res < o->squared_c)
00404     {
00405       o->outlier = false;
00406       nb_inliers++;
00407       if (o->weight != 1.) {
00408         for(int j = 0; j < n*state_size; j++) 
00409           (newJ->data.db + im_n * state_size)[j] *= o->sqrt_weight;
00410       }
00411       for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
00412         eps->data.db[im_n+i] = o->sqrt_weight * (o->b[i] - b[i]);
00413       im_n+=n;
00414       residual += o->weight * res;
00415       assert(o->weight >=0);
00416     }
00417     else
00418     {
00419       o->outlier = true;
00420       if (outliers_in_residual)
00421         residual += o->weight * o->squared_c;
00422     }
00423 
00424     if (residual > current_best_residual) {
00425       eps->rows = 0;
00426       newJ->rows = 0;
00427       return numeric_limits<flt_t>::max();
00428     }
00429   }
00430 
00431   eps->rows = im_n;
00432   newJ->rows = im_n;
00433   return residual;
00434 }
00435 
00436 ls_minimizer2::flt_t ls_minimizer2::build_eps_return_inlier_residual(flt_t * state, flt_t current_best_residual)
00437 {
00438   return build_eps(state, current_best_residual, false);
00439 }
00440 
00441 ls_minimizer2::flt_t ls_minimizer2::inlier_residual(flt_t * state, flt_t current_best_residual)
00442 {
00443   flt_t residual = 0;
00444 
00445   if (new_iteration_callback != 0) new_iteration_callback(state, user_data);
00446 
00447   flt_t b[MAX_B_SIZE];
00448 
00449   for (observation_vector::iterator it = observations.begin();
00450     it != observations.end(); ++it)
00451   {
00452     observation *obs = *it;
00453     if (!obs->outlier) {
00454       obs->eval_func(state, b, 0, user_data);
00455       residual += obs->weight * obs->residual(b);
00456       if (residual > current_best_residual) return numeric_limits<flt_t>::max();
00457     }
00458   }
00459 
00460   return residual;
00461 }
00462 
00463 bool ls_minimizer2::build_J(flt_t * state)
00464 {
00465   int im_n = 0;
00466 
00467   flt_t b[MAX_B_SIZE];
00468   for (observation_vector::iterator it = observations.begin();
00469     it != observations.end(); ++it)
00470   {
00471     observation *obs = *it;
00472     if (!obs->outlier) {
00473       int n = obs->get_nb_measures();
00474       assert(im_n+n <= real_J_size);
00475       obs->eval_func(state, b, J->data.db + im_n*state_size, user_data);
00476       if (obs->weight != 1.) for(int j = 0; j < n*state_size; j++) 
00477         (J->data.db + im_n * state_size)[j] *= obs->sqrt_weight;
00478       im_n += n;
00479     }
00480   }
00481 
00482   J->rows = im_n;
00483 
00484   return true;
00485 }
00486 
00487 ls_minimizer2::flt_t ls_minimizer2::compute_residual(flt_t * state, bool display)
00488 {
00489   if (display)
00490     for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++)
00491       cout << state[i] << " " << flush;
00492 
00493   if (new_iteration_callback != 0) new_iteration_callback(state, user_data);
00494 
00495   flt_t result = residual(state);
00496   if (display)
00497     cout << " -> " << result << endl;
00498 
00499   return result;
00500 }
00501 
00502 void ls_minimizer2::show_state(int vl, flt_t * state, flt_t r)
00503 {
00504   for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++) {
00505     msg(vl, state[i]);
00506     if (i < state_size - 1)
00507       msg(vl, ", ");
00508   }
00509   msg(vl, " --> " << setprecision(20) << r << setprecision(6) << endl);
00510 }
00511 
00512 bool ls_minimizer2::build_J_and_stuff(flt_t * state)
00513 {
00514   //build_J(state);
00515   // Julien: build_eps computed newJ
00516   CvMat *tmp = J;
00517   J = newJ;
00518   newJ = tmp;
00519 
00520   if (J->rows == 0)
00521   {
00522     msg(0, "**: No inliers found" << endl);
00523     return false;
00524   }
00525   //Jt->cols = J->rows;
00526   // Jteps = Jt * eps
00527   cvGEMM(J, eps, 1, 0, 1, Jteps, CV_GEMM_A_T);
00528   cvMulTransposed(J, JtJ, 1);
00529 
00530   return true;
00531 }
00532 
00533 void ls_minimizer2::set_current_c_s(flt_t k)
00534 {
00535   if (k < 0)
00536   {
00537     if (inside_julien_method) return;
00538     for (observation_vector::iterator it = observations.begin();
00539       it != observations.end(); ++it)
00540     {
00541       observation *o = *it;
00542       o->squared_c_current = o->squared_c;
00543     }
00544   }
00545   else
00546   {
00547     for (observation_vector::iterator it = observations.begin();
00548       it != observations.end(); ++it)
00549     {
00550       observation *o = *it;
00551       flt_t c = exp(k * log(o->c_max) + (1. - k) * log(o->c_min));
00552       o->squared_c_current = c * c;
00553     }
00554   }
00555 }
00556 
00557 int ls_minimizer2::count_measures()
00558 {
00559   int n=0;
00560   int nobs=0;
00561   if (observations.size()==0) return 0;
00562 
00563   for (observation_vector::iterator it = observations.begin();
00564     it != observations.end(); ++it)
00565   {
00566     n += (*it)->get_nb_measures();
00567     nobs++;
00568   }
00569   msg(2,nobs << " obs, " << n << " measures"<<endl);
00570   return n;
00571 }
00572 
00579 int ls_minimizer2::minimize_using_levenberg_marquardt_from(flt_t * initial_state)
00580 {
00581   msg(1, "LM: Beginning optimization using Levenberg-Marquardt:" << endl);
00582 
00583   alloc_matrices(count_measures());
00584 
00585   assert(step_solver!=0);
00586   set_new_state(initial_state);
00587   assert(step_solver!=0);
00588 
00589   double *state = new flt_t[state_size];
00590   memcpy(state, initial_state, state_size*sizeof(flt_t));
00591 
00592   set_current_c_s();
00593 
00594   flt_t lambda = lm_initial_lambda, rho = 0., cosinus = 0.;
00595   int iter_nb = 0, failures_in_a_row = 0;
00596   int reason = 0;
00597   flt_t r_previous = build_eps(state), r=0.;
00598 
00599   eps_previous->rows = eps->rows; cvCopy(eps, eps_previous);
00600   build_J_and_stuff(state);
00601   cvCopy(JtJ, aug_JtJ);
00602 
00603   msg(1, "LM: "); show_state(1, state, r_previous);
00604 
00605   while(iter_nb < lm_max_iterations)
00606   {
00607     iter_nb++;
00608     msg(2, "LM: iteration # " << iter_nb << " --------------------------------------------" << endl);
00609 
00610     do {
00611       for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++)
00612         if (use_user_scaling)
00613           aug_JtJ->data.db[i * state_size + i] = JtJ->data.db[i * state_size + i] + lambda * scales[i];
00614         else if (use_automated_scaling)
00615           aug_JtJ->data.db[i * state_size + i] = JtJ->data.db[i * state_size + i] +
00616           lambda * (1 + JtJ->data.db[i * state_size + i] * JtJ->data.db[i * state_size + i]);
00617         else
00618           aug_JtJ->data.db[i * state_size + i] = JtJ->data.db[i * state_size + i] + lambda;
00619 
00620         assert(aug_JtJ->cols == state_size && state_size == aug_JtJ->rows);
00621 
00622         if (!step_solver->qr_solve(aug_JtJ, Jteps, ds)) {
00623           reason = -1;
00624           goto lm_end;
00625         }
00626 
00627         assert(aug_JtJ->cols == state_size && state_size == aug_JtJ->rows);
00628 
00630         for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++) {
00631           new_state[i] = state[i];
00632           state[i] = state[i] + ds->data.db[i];
00633         }
00634 
00635         set_new_state(state);
00636         r = build_eps(state);
00637         rho = r_previous - r;      
00638         if (rho > 0) {
00639           rho /= lambda * cvDotProduct(ds, ds) + cvDotProduct(ds, Jteps);
00640 
00641           Jds->rows = J->rows;
00642           cvMatMul(J, ds, Jds);
00643           cosinus = cvDotProduct(eps_previous, Jds) / (sqrt(r_previous) * sqrt(cvDotProduct(Jds, Jds)));
00644           msg(2, "LM: cosinus = " << cosinus << endl);
00645           if (cosinus < lm_tol_cos) {
00646             reason = 3;
00647             goto lm_end;
00648           }
00649           eps_previous->rows = eps->rows; cvCopy(eps, eps_previous);
00650 
00651           build_J_and_stuff(state);
00652           cvCopy(JtJ, aug_JtJ);
00653           r_previous = r;
00654           lambda = lambda / 10; 
00655 
00656           failures_in_a_row = 0;
00657           msg(2, "LM: iteration succeeded: new lambda = " << lambda << endl);
00658           msg(2, "LM: "); show_state(2, state, r);
00659           if (verbose_level >= 3) { compare_outliers_with_ground_truth(); compare_state_with_ground_truth(); }
00660         }
00661         else {
00662           memcpy(state, new_state, state_size*sizeof(flt_t));
00663           failures_in_a_row++;
00664           if (failures_in_a_row > lm_max_failures_in_a_row) {
00665             reason = 2;
00666             goto lm_end;
00667           }
00668           if (lambda == 0) lambda = 1e-3; else lambda *= 10;
00669 
00670           msg(2, "LM: iteration failed --> " << r << "   new lambda = " << lambda << endl);
00671         }
00672     } while(rho < 0);
00673   }
00674 lm_end:
00675   if (iter_nb >= lm_max_iterations)
00676     reason = 4;
00677 
00678   switch(reason) {
00679     case 2: msg(1, "LM: " << failures_in_a_row << " failures in a row." << endl); break;
00680     case 3: msg(1, "LM: Termination criterion satisfied: cosinus = " << cosinus << " < " << lm_tol_cos << endl);
00681       break;
00682     case 4: msg(1, "LM: Too many iterations." << endl); break;
00683     case -1: msg(1, "LM: qr_solve failed\n"); break;
00684     default:
00685       msg(1, "LM: unkown termination reason" << endl);
00686   }
00687 
00688   msg(1, "LM: ");
00689   for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++)
00690   {
00691     msg(1, state[i]);
00692     if (i < state_size - 1)
00693       msg(1, ", ");
00694   }
00695   msg(1, " --> " << r << endl);
00696   msg(1, "LM: End of minimization." << endl);
00697 
00698   if (new_iteration_callback != 0) new_iteration_callback(state, user_data);
00699 
00700   delete[] state;
00701   return reason;
00702 }
00703 
00704 void ls_minimizer2::set_new_state(const flt_t *new_state)
00705 {
00706   if (memcmp(new_state, state, sizeof(flt_t)*state_size)==0) return;
00707   for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++) state[i] = new_state[i];
00708   if (state_change_callback) state_change_callback(state, user_data);
00709 }
00710 
00711 ls_minimizer2::flt_t ls_minimizer2::dl_update_Delta(flt_t rho, flt_t Delta, flt_t rho_min, flt_t rho_max)
00712 {
00713   if (rho < rho_min) return Delta / 2;
00714   if (rho > rho_max) return Delta * 2;
00715   return rho;
00716 }
00717 
00718 int ls_minimizer2::minimize_using_dogleg_from(flt_t * initial_state)
00719 {
00720   msg(1, "DL: Beginning optimization using Dog Leg algorithm:" << endl);
00721 
00722   alloc_matrices(count_measures());
00723 
00724   set_new_state(initial_state);
00725 
00726   set_current_c_s();
00727 
00728   flt_t Delta = 10000., rho = 0., cosinus = 0.;
00729   flt_t dl_delta_gn_computed = false;
00730   int iter_nb = 0, failures_in_a_row = 0;
00731   int reason = 0;
00732 
00733   flt_t r_previous = build_eps(state), r = 0.;
00734   eps_previous->rows = eps->rows; cvCopy(eps, eps_previous);
00735   build_J_and_stuff(state);
00736 
00737   msg(1, "DL: "); show_state(1, state, r_previous);
00738 
00739   while(iter_nb < lm_max_iterations)
00740   {
00741     iter_nb++;
00742     msg(2, "DL: iteration # " << iter_nb << " --------------------------------------------" << endl);
00743 
00744     JJteps->rows = J->rows;
00745     cvMatMul(J, Jteps, JJteps);
00746     cvScale(Jteps, dl_delta_sd, cvDotProduct(Jteps, Jteps) / cvDotProduct(JJteps, JJteps));
00747 
00748     dl_delta_gn_computed = false;
00749 
00750     do {
00751       msg(2, "DL: Delta = " << Delta << endl);
00752       if (cvDotProduct(dl_delta_sd, dl_delta_sd) > Delta * Delta)
00753       {
00754         cvScale(dl_delta_sd, dl_delta_dl, Delta / cvDotProduct(dl_delta_sd, dl_delta_sd));
00755         msg(2, "DL: Trying truncated steepest descent step" << endl);
00756       }
00757       else {
00758         if (!dl_delta_gn_computed) {
00759           step_solver->qr_solve(JtJ, Jteps, dl_delta_gn);
00760           //          step_solver->qr_solve(J, eps, dl_delta_gn);
00761           dl_delta_gn_computed = true;
00762         }
00763         if (cvDotProduct(dl_delta_gn, dl_delta_gn) <= Delta * Delta)
00764         {
00765           cvCopy(dl_delta_gn, dl_delta_dl);
00766 
00767           msg(2, "DL: Trying gauss-newton step" << endl);
00768         }
00769         else {
00770           cvSub(dl_delta_gn, dl_delta_sd, dl_delta_diff);
00771           flt_t beta1, beta2, beta;
00772           solve_deg2(cvDotProduct(dl_delta_diff, dl_delta_diff), 
00773             2 * cvDotProduct(dl_delta_sd, dl_delta_diff), 
00774             cvDotProduct(dl_delta_sd, dl_delta_sd) - Delta * Delta,
00775             beta1, beta2);
00776           beta = (beta1 > 0) ? beta1 : beta2;
00777           cvScaleAdd(dl_delta_diff, cvScalar(beta), dl_delta_sd, dl_delta_dl);
00778 
00779           msg(2, "DL: Trying truncated gauss-newton step" << endl);
00780         }
00781       }
00782       for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++) new_state[i] = state[i] + dl_delta_dl->data.db[i];
00784       r = build_eps(new_state);
00785       cvMatMul(JtJ, dl_delta_dl, JtJdelta);
00786       flt_t L_delta = 2 * ( 0.5 * r_previous - cvDotProduct(Jteps, dl_delta_dl) + 0.5 * cvDotProduct(dl_delta_dl, JtJdelta));
00787       rho = (r_previous - r) / (r_previous - L_delta);
00788       if (rho > 0) {
00789         set_new_state(new_state);
00790         Jds->rows = J->rows;
00791         cvMatMul(J, dl_delta_dl, Jds);
00792         cosinus = cvDotProduct(eps_previous, Jds) / (sqrt(r_previous) * sqrt(cvDotProduct(Jds, Jds)));
00793         msg(2, "DL: cosinus = " << cosinus << endl);
00794         if (cosinus < dl_tol_cos) {
00795           reason = 3;
00796           goto dl_end;
00797         }
00798         eps_previous->rows = eps->rows; cvCopy(eps, eps_previous);
00799         r_previous = r;
00800         build_J_and_stuff(state);
00801 
00802         failures_in_a_row = 0;
00803         msg(2, "DL: "); show_state(2, state, r);
00804         if (verbose_level >= 3) { compare_outliers_with_ground_truth(); compare_state_with_ground_truth(); }
00805       }
00806       else {
00807         msg(2, "DL:  -> failure." << endl);
00808 
00809         failures_in_a_row++;
00810         if (failures_in_a_row > lm_max_failures_in_a_row) {
00811           reason = 2;
00812           goto dl_end;
00813         }
00814       }
00815       Delta = dl_update_Delta(rho, Delta, 0.25, 0.75);
00816     } while(rho < 0);
00817   }
00818 dl_end:
00819   if (iter_nb >= lm_max_iterations)
00820     reason = 4;
00821 
00822   if (reason == 2) msg(1, "DL: " << failures_in_a_row << " failures in a row." << endl);
00823   if (reason == 3) msg(1, "DL: Termination criterion satisfied: cosinus = " << cosinus << " < " << lm_tol_cos << endl);
00824   if (reason == 4) msg(1, "DL: Too many iterations." << endl);
00825 
00826   msg(1, "DL: ");
00827   for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++)
00828   {
00829     msg(1, state[i]);
00830     if (i < state_size - 1)
00831       msg(1, ", ");
00832   }
00833   msg(1, " --> " << r << endl);
00834   msg(1, "DL: End of minimization." << endl);
00835 
00836   if (new_iteration_callback != 0) new_iteration_callback(state, user_data);
00837 
00838   return reason;
00839 }
00840 
00841 bool ls_minimizer2::line_search(CvMat * dir, 
00842                                 flt_t lambda_min, flt_t lambda_max, 
00843                                 flt_t residual0, flt_t & new_residual, flt_t & new_lambda)
00844 {
00845   lambda_min = lambda_max = 0.; // 
00846 
00847   alloc_matrices(count_measures());
00848 
00849   static flt_t lambda = ct_lambda0;
00850   for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++) new_state[i] = state[i] + lambda * dir->data.db[i];
00851   flt_t residual_lambda = inlier_residual(new_state, residual0);
00852   flt_t old_residual = residual_lambda;
00853 
00854   while(residual_lambda > residual0)
00855   {
00856     msg(2, " LS: rough search lambda = " << lambda << endl);
00857     lambda /= ct_k_rough;
00858     for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++) new_state[i] = state[i] + lambda * dir->data.db[i];
00859     old_residual = residual_lambda;
00860     residual_lambda = inlier_residual(new_state, residual0);
00861   }
00862 
00863   while(residual_lambda < residual0)
00864   {
00865     msg(2, " LS: rough search lambda = " << lambda << endl);
00866     residual0 = residual_lambda;
00867     lambda *= ct_k_rough;
00868     for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++) new_state[i] = state[i] + lambda * dir->data.db[i];
00869     old_residual = residual_lambda;
00870     residual_lambda = inlier_residual(new_state, old_residual);
00871   }
00872   lambda /= ct_k_rough;
00873   residual_lambda = old_residual;
00874   for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++) new_state[i] = state[i] + lambda * dir->data.db[i];
00875 
00876   bool found = false;
00877   while(residual_lambda < new_residual)
00878   {
00879     msg(2, " LS: fine  search lambda = " << lambda << endl);
00880     new_residual = residual_lambda;
00881     memcpy(best_state, new_state, state_size * sizeof(flt_t));
00882     new_lambda = lambda;
00883     found = true;
00884 
00885     lambda *= ct_k_fine;
00886     for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++) new_state[i] = state[i] + lambda * dir->data.db[i];
00887     residual_lambda = build_eps(new_state, new_residual);
00888   }
00889 
00890   return found;
00891 }
00892 
00893 bool confidence_cmp(const ls_minimizer2::observation *a, const ls_minimizer2::observation *b)
00894 {
00895   return a->confidence > b->confidence;
00896 }
00897 
00898 int ls_minimizer2::minimize_using_cattail_from(flt_t * initial_state)
00899 {
00900   msg(1, "CT: Beginning optimization using Cat Tail algorithm:" << endl);
00901 
00902   alloc_matrices(count_measures());
00903 
00904   sort(observations.begin(), observations.end(), confidence_cmp);
00905   //observations.sort();
00906 
00907   memcpy(state, initial_state, state_size * sizeof(flt_t));
00908 
00909   set_current_c_s();
00910 
00911   flt_t r;
00912   int iter_nb = 0;
00913   int reason;
00914   do
00915   {
00916     if (verbose_level >= 3) { msg(3, "CT: "); compare_state_with_ground_truth(); }
00917 
00918     r = build_eps_return_inlier_residual(state);
00919     flt_t best_r = r;
00920     build_J_and_stuff(state);
00921 
00922     msg(2, "CT " << nb_inliers << " inliers." << endl);
00923 
00924     int method = -1;
00925     flt_t best_lambda, gain = 0.;
00926 
00927     step_solver->qr_solve(J, eps, ct_delta_gn);
00928     for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++) best_state[i] = state[i] + ct_delta_gn->data.db[i];
00929     flt_t r_gn = inlier_residual(best_state, best_r);
00930     if (r_gn < best_r)
00931     {
00932       gain = r - r_gn;
00933       best_r = r_gn;
00934       method = 1;
00935     }
00936 
00937     for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++) ct_delta_sd->data.db[i] = Jteps->data.db[i] / JtJ->data.db[i * state_size + i];
00938     if (line_search(ct_delta_sd, 0.0001, 1, r, best_r, best_lambda))
00939     {
00940       gain = r - best_r;
00941       method = 2;
00942     }
00943 
00944     if (method == -1)
00945     {
00946       reason = 2;
00947       goto ct_end;
00948     }
00949     else if (method == 1)
00950       msg(2, "CT: Taking the gauss-newton step." << endl);
00951     else if (method == 2)
00952       msg(2, "CT: Taking the corrected linear model step (lambda = " << best_lambda << ")." << endl);
00953     else 
00954     {
00955       cerr << "bug in ls_minimizer2::minimize_using_cattail_from" << endl;
00956       exit(0);
00957     }
00958 
00959     msg(2, "CT: Gain = " << gain << " --> residual = " << best_r << endl);
00960     memcpy(state, best_state, state_size * sizeof(flt_t));
00961 
00962     r = best_r;
00963     iter_nb++;
00965   } while(iter_nb < ct_max_iterations);
00966   reason = 4;
00967 
00968 ct_end:
00969   if (reason == 2) msg(2, "CT: no improvement found." << endl);
00970   if (reason == 4) msg(2, "CT: Too many iterations (" << ct_max_iterations << ")." << endl);
00971 
00972   msg(1, "CT: ");
00973   for(int i = 0; i < state_size; i++)
00974   {
00975     msg(1, state[i]);
00976     if (i < state_size - 1)
00977       msg(1, ", ");
00978   }
00979   msg(1, " --> " << r << endl);
00980   msg(1, "CT: End of minimization." << endl);
00981 
00982   if (new_iteration_callback != 0) new_iteration_callback(state, user_data);
00983 
00984   return 4;
00985 }
00986 
00987 bool ls_minimizer2::pick_random_indices(int *idx, int n, int max_index)
00988 {
00989 
00990   if ( n > max_index ) return false;
00991 
00992   for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {
00993     idx[i] = rand()%max_index;
00994 
00995     for (int j=0; j<i; j++)
00996       if (idx[i]==idx[j]) {
00997         --i;
00998         break;
00999       }
01000   }
01001   return true;
01002 }
01003 
01004 static inline unsigned mymin(unsigned a, unsigned b) {
01005   return (a>b? b : a);
01006 }
01007 
01008 ls_minimizer2::flt_t ls_minimizer2::minimize_using_prosac(sample_consensus_func f, 
01009                                                           int nb_samples,
01010                                                           int min_number_of_inliers, int max_number_of_iterations)
01011 {
01012   alloc_matrices(count_measures());
01013 
01014   sort(observations.begin(), observations.end(), confidence_cmp);
01015   //observations.sort();
01016 
01017   /*flt_t b[MAX_B_SIZE];*/
01018   flt_t best_residual = numeric_limits<flt_t>::max();
01019   int *idx = new int[nb_samples];
01020   observation **o = new observation *[nb_samples];
01021   for(int iter = 0; iter < max_number_of_iterations; iter++)
01022   {
01023     if (!pick_random_indices(idx, nb_samples, mymin(iter + nb_samples, observations.size())))
01024     {
01025       cerr << "PR: not enough observations." << endl;
01026       return false;
01027     }
01028 
01029     for (int i=0; i<nb_samples; i++) {
01030       //o[i] = observations[idx[i]];
01031       observation_vector::iterator it=observations.begin();
01032       for (int j=0; j<idx[i]; ++i) ++it;
01033       o[i] = *it;
01034     }
01035 
01037     if (f(new_state, o, nb_samples, user_data))
01038     {
01039       set_new_state(new_state);
01040       flt_t new_residual = build_eps(state, best_residual);
01041       if (new_residual < best_residual)
01042       {
01043         best_residual = new_residual;
01044         memcpy(best_state, state, state_size * sizeof(flt_t));
01045         int nb_inliers = 0;
01046         for (observation_vector::iterator it = observations.begin();
01047           it != observations.end(); ++it)
01048         {
01049           if (!(*it)->outlier)
01050             nb_inliers++;
01051         }
01052         if (nb_inliers > min_number_of_inliers)
01053           break;
01054       }
01055     }
01056   }
01057 
01058   delete[] o;
01059   delete[] idx;
01060 
01061   memcpy(state, best_state, state_size * sizeof(flt_t));
01062   return best_residual;
01063 }
01064 
01065 ls_minimizer2::flt_t ls_minimizer2::minimize_using_julien_method_from(const flt_t * initial_state, int nb_steps, int nb_iterations_per_step)
01066 {
01067   alloc_matrices(count_measures());
01068   inside_julien_method = true;
01069   ct_set_max_iterations(nb_iterations_per_step);
01070 
01071   memcpy(state, initial_state, state_size * sizeof(flt_t));
01072 
01073   for(int i = 0; i < nb_steps; i++)
01074   {
01075     msg(2, endl);
01076     msg(2, "-----------------------------------------------------------------" << endl);
01077     msg(2, " STEP # " << i << " / " << nb_steps << endl);
01078     msg(2, "-----------------------------------------------------------------" << endl);
01079     set_current_c_s(1. - flt_t(i) / (nb_steps - 1));
01080     minimize_using_cattail_from(state);
01081   }
01082 
01083   ct_set_max_iterations(50);
01084   minimize_using_cattail_from(state);
01085 
01086   inside_julien_method = false;
01087 
01088   return 0;
01089 }
01090 
01091 void ls_minimizer2::check_jacobians_around(flt_t * state0, flt_t state_step)
01092 {
01093   alloc_matrices(count_measures());
01094   flt_t b0[MAX_B_SIZE];
01095   flt_t b[MAX_B_SIZE];
01096 
01097   int obsnb=0;
01098 
01099   for (observation_vector::iterator it = observations.begin();
01100     it != observations.end(); ++it)
01101   {
01102     cout << "OBS #" << obsnb++ << endl;
01103 
01104     observation *o = *it;
01105     int n = o->get_nb_measures();
01106     flt_t * J = new flt_t[n * state_size];
01107     set_new_state(state0);
01108     o->eval_func(state, b0, J, user_data);
01109 
01110     for(int j = 0; j < state_size; j++)
01111     {
01112       for(int k = 0; k < state_size; k++)
01113         new_state[k] = state0[k];
01114       new_state[j] += state_step;
01115 
01116       set_new_state(new_state);
01117 
01118       o->eval_func(state, b, 0, user_data);
01119       for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {
01120         flt_t analytic = J[i*state_size + j];
01121         flt_t numeric = (b[i] - b0[i])/state_step;
01122 
01123         cout << " (df" << i << "/ds" << j << ") = " 
01124           << analytic << " = " << numeric << endl;
01125       }
01126     }
01127 
01128     delete [] J;
01129   }
01130 }
